issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: sysdb test is not updated and fails on update

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

ATTACHMENT ID: 12941900 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build
Patch pushed to master. Thanks Thejas for review!

[~daijy] Looks like this commit is failing sysdb, resourceplan and strict_managed_tables_sysdb tests - https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HIVE-Build/14691/testReport/
Can you please take a look?
Should be fixed by now. Thanks [~vgarg] bringing it out.
[~daijy] {{resourceplan}} and {{strict_managed_tables_sysdb}} are still failing. They look related to this patch but I am not 100% certain.
Sorry miss the resourceplan and strict_managed_tables_sysdb. They also need to update. Now should be ok.
